title: Approximation of child's handwriting
content:
Yes it’s from the EULA violators

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163853im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/IMG_0872_4295.JPG)

 [‹ Can anyone identify this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163853/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43045 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ball-terminal slab serif with personality ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163853/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43031 "Go to next forum topic")
author: roquestrew

comments.content: There isn’t much keeping this from being in-house handlettering.

The photo isn’t the best, but there are a fair amount of repeated forms, which gave me hope (though I realize that fact doesn’t mean it’s a typeface I can go out and buy)

Know of any designs similar in spirit?
